array.string: Increases total Presence by 3% and all healing done by 1%.
Increases total Presence by 6% and all healing done by 2%.
Increases the Force critical chance by 1%.
Increases the Force critical chance by 2%.
Increases the Force critical chance by 3%.
Reduces the activation time of Dark Infusion by 0.25 seconds.
Reduces the activation time of Dark Infusion by 0.5 seconds.
Increases the damage and healing of area effect abilities by 5%.
Increases the damage and healing of area effect abilities by 10%.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating healing abilities by 25% and lowers the threat generated by healing abilities by 5%.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating healing abilities by 50% and lowers the threat generated by healing abilities by 10%.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating healing abilities by 75% and lowers the threat generated by healing abilities by 15%.
Reduces the Force cost of Static Barrier by 15 and reduces the cooldown of Static Barrier by 1.5 seconds.
Reduces the Force cost of Static Barrier by 30 and reduces the cooldown of Static Barrier by 3 seconds.
Reduces the health spent by Consumption by 1%.
Reduces the health spent by Consumption by 2%.
Immediately heals a target for 9, plus an additional ? over ? seconds.

Your Resurgence has a 50% chance to grant Force Bending, which increases the effect of your next healing ability: Dark Heal: Force cost reduced by 50%. Dark Infusion: Activation time reduced by 1 second. Innervate: Critical chance increased by 25%. Revivification: Force cost reduced by 30%.

Your Resurgence has a 100% chance to grant Force Bending, which increases the effect of your next healing ability: Dark Heal: Force cost reduced by 50%. Dark Infusion: Activation time reduced by 1 second. Innervate: Critical chance increased by 25%. Revivification: Force cost reduced by 30%.
Static Barrier increases the target's movement speed by 10% for 3 seconds.
Static Barrier increases the target's movement speed by 20% for 6 seconds.
Increases the duration of Resurgence by 3 seconds. In addition, Resurgence has a 50% chance to increase the target's armor rating by 10% for the duration of Resurgence.
Increases the duration of Resurgence by 6 seconds. In addition, Resurgence has a 100% chance to increase the target's armor rating by 10% for the duration of Resurgence.
Lowers the Force cost of Purge by 15. In addition, Purge now removes negative physical effects and heals the target for ?.
Increases your Force critical chance by 1% and reduces all damage taken by ?%.
Increases your Force critical chance by 2% and reduces all damage taken by ?%.
Immediately heals a target for ? and a further ? per second for 3 seconds.
Targets affected by your Affliction are slowed by 10% for its duration.
Targets affected by your Affliction are slowed by 20% for its duration.
Increases your bonus healing by 2% and chance to hit with all abilities by 1%.
Increases your bonus healing by 4% and chance to hit with all abilities by 2%.
Increases your bonus healing by 6% and chance to hit with all abilities by 3%.
Innervate critical hits have a ?% chance to make the next Consumption activate without degenerating Force or consuming health.
Innervate critical hits have a ?% chance to make the next Consumption activate without degenerating Force or consuming health.
Heals all allies within 8 meters of the targeted area. Targets remaining in the area heal for an additional ? over ? seconds.
Increases the damage dealt by Lightning Strike, Crushing Darkness, Chain Lightning and Thundering Blast by 2%.
Increases the damage dealt by Lightning Strike, Crushing Darkness, Chain Lightning and Thundering Blast by 4%.
Increases the damage dealt by Lightning Strike, Crushing Darkness, Chain Lightning and Thundering Blast by 6%.
Reduces the Force cost of Force attacks and healing abilities by 3%.
Reduces the Force cost of Force attacks and healing abilities by 6%.
Reduces the Force cost of Force attacks and healing abilities by 9%.
Increases the amount absorbed by your Static Barrier by 10%.
Increases the amount absorbed by your Static Barrier by 20%.

Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Lightning Strike, Chain Lightning and Thundering Blast by 35%. In addition, Lightning Strike has a 50% chance to increase your Force regeneration rate by 10% for 10 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.

Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Lightning Strike, Chain Lightning and Thundering Blast by 70%. In addition, Lightning Strike has a 100% chance to increase your Force regeneration rate by 10% for 10 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.
Increases the duration of Affliction by 3 seconds.
Increases the duration of Affliction by 6 seconds.
Increases the maximum range of Lightning Strike, Chain Lightning and Thundering Blast by 5 meters.
Overload has a 50% chance to bind its targets in electricity, immobilizing them for 5 seconds. Damage dealt after 2 seconds ends the effect prematurely.
Overload has a 100% chance to bind its targets in electricity, immobilizing them for 5 seconds. Damage dealt after 2 seconds ends the effect prematurely.
Affliction's critical hits have a 50% chance to grant Lightning Barrage, causing your next Force Lightning to channel and tick twice as fast. This effect cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

Affliction's critical hits have a 100% chance to grant Lightning Barrage, causing your next Force Lightning to channel and tick twice as fast. This effect cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.
Delivers an arc of lightning that deals (current weapon) damage to up to 5 targets within 8 meters.
Lowers the cooldown of Whirlwind by 7.5 seconds and increases the lockout duration of Jolt by 1 second.
Lowers the cooldown of Whirlwind by 15 seconds and increases the lockout duration of Jolt by 2 second.
Your Static Barrier has a 50% chance to erupt in a flash of light when it ends, blinding all nearby enemies for 3 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely.
Your Static Barrier has a 100% chance to erupt in a flash of light when it ends, blinding all nearby enemies for 3 seconds. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely.

Force attacks that critically hit have a 50% chance to grant Lightning Effusion, reducing the Force cost of your next two Force abilities by 50%. Additionally reduces the cooldown of Force Speed by 5 seconds.

Force attacks that critically hit have a 100% chance to grant Lightning Effusion, reducing the Force cost of your next two Force abilities by 50%. Additionally reduces the cooldown of Force Speed by 10 seconds.

Your Lightning Strike has a 30% chance and your Force Storm has a 10% chance when dealing damage to cause a Lightning Storm, immediately finishing the cooldown on Chain Lightning and reducing the activation time of your next Chain Lightning by 100%. This effect cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.
Your connection to the Force shifts, granting 20% alacrity for 10 seconds.
When you activate Lightning Strike or Chain Lightning, there is a 10% chance the ability will produce a second arc of lightning that strikes the same targets for 30% damage.
When you activate Lightning Strike or Chain Lightning, there is a 20% chance the ability will produce a second arc of lightning that strikes the same targets for 30% damage.
When you activate Lightning Strike or Chain Lightning, there is a 30% chance the ability will produce a second arc of lightning that strikes the same targets for 30% damage.
Your Forked Lightning conducts the Force, increasing your Force bonus damage by 1% for 30 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.
Increases the critical damage dealt by Affliction, Chain Lightning and Thundering Blast by 10%.
Increases the critical damage dealt by Affliction, Chain Lightning and Thundering Blast by 20%.
Increases the critical damage dealt by Affliction, Chain Lightning and Thundering Blast by 30%.
Increases the critical damage dealt by Affliction, Chain Lightning and Thundering Blast by 40%.
Increases the critical damage dealt by Affliction, Chain Lightning and Thundering Blast by 50%.
Sends a thundering blastwave at a target that deals (current weapon) internal damage. Thundering Blast automatically critically hits targets affected by your Affliction.
Increases the damage dealt by Force Lightning by 4%.
Increases the damage dealt by Force Lightning by 8%.
Increases the damage dealt by Force Lightning by 12%.
Increases the critical chance of Force Lightning and Lightning Strike by 5%.
Increases the critical chance of Force Lightning and Lightning Strike by 10%.
Causes critical hits from periodic damage abilities to restore 0.5% of your total health.
Causes critical hits from periodic damage abilities to restore 1% of your total health.
When you activate Shock, you have a 15% chance to activate a second Shock, dealing 50% of normal damage.
When you activate Shock, you have a 30% chance to activate a second Shock, dealing 50% of normal damage.
When you activate Shock, you have a 45% chance to activate a second Shock, dealing 50% of normal damage.
Lowers the cooldown of Electrocute by 5 seconds. In addition, your Whirlwind affects up to 1 within 8 meters of the target.
Lowers the cooldown of Electrocute by 10 seconds. In addition, your Whirlwind affects up to 2 within 8 meters of the target.
Force Lightning no longer has a cooldown.

Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Crushing Darkness and Force Lightning by 25%. In addition, each time your Force Lightning deals damage, you have a 33.334% chance to recover 1% of your total Force.

Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Crushing Darkness and Force Lightning by 50%. In addition, each time your Force Lightning deals damage, you have a 66.668% chance to recover 1% of your total Force.

Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Crushing Darkness and Force Lightning by 75%. In addition, each time your Force Lightning deals damage, you have a 100.002% chance to recover 1% of your total Force.
Creates a death field at the target location, dealing (current weapon) internal damage and stealing ? health from up to 3 targets within an 8-meter radius.
When your Force Lightning deals damage, you have a 30% chance to cause your next damaging Force attack with an activation time to activate instantly and deal 20% more damage.
Reduces the damage taken by all periodic effects by 7.5%.
Reduces the damage taken by all periodic effects by 15%.
Lowers the activation time of Whirlwind by 50%. In addition, when your Whirlwind breaks early from damage, the target is stunned for 1.
Lowers the activation time of Whirlwind by 100%. In addition, when your Whirlwind breaks early from damage, the target is stunned for 2.
Increases the duration of Crushing Darkness by 1.
Increases the duration of Crushing Darkness by 2.
Increases the damage dealt by Affliction by 7.5%.
Increases the damage dealt by Affliction by 15%.
Death Field places a deathmark on affected targets, increasing the amount of damage the targets suffer from your next 10 periodic damaging abilities by 20%. Lasts 30 seconds.
Increases the amount of healing generated by Death Field and Parasitism by 10%.
Increases the amount of healing generated by Death Field and Parasitism by 20%.
Increases the critical damage bonus of Death Field and your periodic damage abilities by 10%.
Increases the critical damage bonus of Death Field and your periodic damage abilities by 20%.
Increases the critical damage bonus of Death Field and your periodic damage abilities by 30%.
Paralyzes the target in fear, immobilizing it for 2 seconds and dealing (current weapon) internal damage over 18 seconds.
